name: Treasure Hunting Orphan Saver
description:
Treasure Hunting Orphan Saver  by LawnMowerz

Set in a Steampunk universe. You play as the thief, the eldest orphan from the orphanage. Due to economic hardship, you have taken it upon yourself to ensure that the orphans are fed. Using your trusty grappling hook, swing through the city to find treasure and make sure that the orphans don’t starve.

Controls

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Mouse - Aim Grappling hook

Left Mouse Button - Fire the grappling hook

Art by

Aloeveraninja - https://aloeveraninja.itch.io/

Eyenshi - https://eyenshi.itch.io/

Programmed by

Ocemandias
